app.name: (Ether) Publish/Subscribe (PUBSUB) sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates PUBSUB functionality using AWS services with ethernet connection.

apps.app:
RXC CK-RX65N
configuration/samples/pubsub/ck-rx65n/ether/src/frtos_config src/frtos_config
Projects/aws_ether_ck_rx65n/e2studio_ccrx/src/application_code/main.c Projects/aws_ether_ck_rx65n/e2studio_ccrx/src/application_code/user_init.c src/application_code

src/application_code src/application_code/include src/application_code/ports/ota_pal src/frtos_config src/frtos_startup

RXC Middleware/FreeRTOS/FreeRTOS-Plus-TCP/source/portable/Compiler/Renesas

name true freertos_plus_tcp

name true heap_4.c
RX600 Middleware/FreeRTOS/FreeRTOS-Kernel/portable/Renesas 9
name true RX600v2
Middleware/FreeRTOS/FreeRTOS-Plus-TCP/source/portable/BufferManagement 5
name true BufferAllocation_2.c

name true Renesas
Middleware/FreeRTOS/FreeRTOS-Plus-TCP/source/portable/NetworkInterface 9
name true RX
src/application_code/ports 10
name false pkcs11
f
configuration/samples/common/ck-rx65n/ether/CK-RX65N_ether_scfg.ftl
RXC CK-RX65N
SU SI R_1 B_2 R RPFRAM2 0x00000004
C_FIRMWARE_UPDATE_CONTROL_BLOCK C_FIRMWARE_UPDATE_CONTROL_BLOCK_MIRROR 0x00100000
C_PKCS11_STORAGE* 0x00100800
B_ETHERNET_BUFFERS* B_RX_DESC* B_TX_DESC* B B_1 R_2 0x00800000
PResetPRG C_1 C_2 C C$* D* W* L P PFRAM PFRAM2 0xFFF00300
PFRAM2=RPFRAM2
RXC CK-RX65N DEXRAM=REXRAM DEXRAM_1=REXRAM_1 DEXRAM_2=REXRAM_2
com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.base.compiler com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.compiler.option.gOptimize true
com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.base.assembler com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.assembler.option.goptimize true
com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.base.linker com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.linker.option.optimize com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.linker.option.optimize.all
com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.base.converter com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.converter.option.separated.form.motorolaFile com.renesas.cdt.managedbuild.renesas.ccrx.converter.option.outputHexFile true
RXC ctype.h math.h mathf.h stdarg.h stdio.h stdlib.h string.h new.h fenv.h inttypes.h ctype.h
RXC CK-RX65N MBEDTLS_CONFIG_FILE="<aws_mbedtls_config.h>" CONFIG_MEDTLS_USE_AFR_MEMORY MBEDTLS_CMAC_C MBEDTLS_ERROR_C MBEDTLS_THREADING_C MBEDTLS_ALLOW_PRIVATE_ACCESS __LITTLE_ENDIAN__

app.name: (Ether) Fleet Provisioning with Publish/Subscribe (PUBSUB) sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates Fleet Provisioning functionality, followed by PUBSUB using AWS services with ethernet connection.

app.name: (Cellular) Fleet Provisioning with Publish/Subscribe (PUBSUB) sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates Fleet Provisioning functionality, followed by PUBSUB using AWS services with ethernet connection.

app.name: (Ether) Publish/Subscribe (PUBSUB) with Over-the-air (OTA) update sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates PUBSUB and OTA update functionality (simultaneously) using AWS services with ethernet connection. Note: This project requires bootloader project.

app.name: (Cellular) Publish/Subscribe (PUBSUB) with Over-the-air (OTA) update sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates PUBSUB and OTA update functionality (simultaneously) using AWS services with ethernet connection. Note: This project requires bootloader project.

app.name: (Ether) Fleet Provisioning with Publish/Subscribe (PUBSUB) and Over-the-air (OTA) update sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates Fleet provisioning functionality followed by PUBSUB and OTA update (simultaneously) using AWS services with ethernet connection. Note: This project requires bootloader project.

app.name: (Cellular) Fleet Provisioning with Publish/Subscribe (PUBSUB) and Over-the-air (OTA) update sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates Fleet provisioning functionality followed by PUBSUB and OTA update (simultaneously) using AWS services with cellular connection. Note: This project requires bootloader project.

app.name: Secure bootloader sample project
app.description: This sample is used together with OTA sample project to provide a secure boot
